name: Toilet Tycoon
description: Toilet Tycoon is an unusual economic simulation in which you can prove your skills as a leader of the sanitarian installations of a whole town! On your way to the top, you have calculate wisely and should always keep an eye on your opponents - else you simply will be flushed...
minimum_requirements: OS: XP,Vista,7,8,10 Processor: Pentium 100 Mhz Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: 800x600 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 25 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Surprisingly fun little tycoon game with good writing. Very casual style game without a lot of depth, but more than you might think. I finished first game in about 2 hours on the easier levels. Clever if nothing else and good for a short while. I may get another play through but don't really expect 20 hours of play time. For what it is, I had a good time so I will recommend it. I will say the music did get a bit annoying after a while... :)
So you really call this is a game? It's totally a joke. Do not waste your money.

=--------REVIEW SYNOPSIS-------------= ....I mean, does this really need explanation on why this is a bad game? It's a toilet simulator, created by..... no. I can't do this. Whoever thought that a TOILET simulator would be a good idea had to have been smokin' a little somethin'-somethin', know what I mean?  =--------PROGRESSIVE POINTS----------= *Wat is progressive about a toilet?  =--------CONTRARY POINTS-------------= *Clunky interface *Crashes Steam *Won't start half the time *Somehow has a release date of March 1st, 2000. Surely you jest?  =--------PERSONAL GAME RESULTS-------= I give this game a 0/10 I give this game a [SPRAY-PAINTED GOLDEN TURD]
